title: How many words are in 300 characters? - Quora

response.answer_text: It can vary widely. The average is 5–6 characters per word, so 300 characters would give 50–60 words. If, however, you are writing on a different level, words may be much larger than 5–6 characters. Academic or scientific papers will normally extend far beyond 6 characters.
